title: Flowmaster Force II Cat-back Exhaust System for the 2014-2016 GM 1500 Truck PN: 817672
description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761
View this product: http://bit.ly/1HDYRrg
Visit the Flowmaster website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817672

Application:
Fits 2014-2016 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 and GMC Sierra 1500 Crew Cab and Double Cab models with 4.3L V6 or 5.3L V8 gas engine. Does Not Fit Crew Cab 2WD with 2 Pc Driveshaft.

Features:
Flowmaster's Force II cat-back exhaust system for the 2014-2016 GM 1500 trucks is perfect for the person looking for a moderate sound level inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster.  This bolt-on SOS (Single Out Side) emissions-legal system, for the 4.3L/5.3L Crew Cab models with 5.5' and 6.5' bed, features a stainless steel Super 50 Series muffler and a single 3.00" stainless steel mandrel bent tailpipe.  The system finishes off with a polished 4.00" logo embossed stainless steel tip. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.  Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.

✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Mild Performance Tone
✓ Patented Delta Flow Technology
✓ Lifetime Limited Warranty
✓ Made in the USA
